Name: Chester T. O'Brien
Propulsion: 2 boilers, 2 geared turbine engines, 12,000 shp (8,900 kW), 2 screws
Range: 6,000 nautical miles (11,000 km) at 12 knots (22 km/h)
Armament:
2 × single 5 in (127 mm) guns
2 × twin 40 mm (1.6 in) AA guns 
10 × single 20 mm (0.79 in) AA guns 
1 × triple 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes 
8 × depth charge throwers
1 × Hedgehog ASW mortar
2 × depth charge racks
